H0.text: Water is where plants get most of the energy they need to live and grow.

H1.text: Soil is the source of most of the energy that plants need to live and grow.

H2.text: Air is where plants get most of the energy they need to live and grow.

H3.text: Sunlight is where plants get most of the energy they need to live and grow.

A4.text: Photosynthesis converts light energy — typically from sunlight — into the chemical energy necessary to fuel their metabolism.

A5.text: Plants need light, not just soil and water.
